response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose to sell the product to you for $14,000. This price not only ensures a fair return on my investment but also leaves room for you to enjoy a significant savings compared to its market value of $15,000. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
